Attainist - Learn Better

Attainist provides a custom dashboard for education attainment tracking. Say you're learning Spanish. You log in and track your progress every time you study or learn something new. Attainist makes keeping track easy, and reminds you when you forget. Key technologies - Bootstrap, CSS3, Ruby on Rails.

See More: https://attainist.herokuapp.com/

LaunchKit

Open source framework for an basic app promotional site. Just add your pictures and branding. Built with Twitter powerful open-source front-end framework Bootstrap, this template is easily customizable, even with minimal technical knowledge. Best of all, this is free to use for personal or commercial projects. Source code is available on github. Key technologies - Bootstrap, jQuery, CSS3.

See More: http://www.jamesonknoll.com/projects/launchkit/

Autograder

Autograder is a customized study plan creator for SAT prep students. Simply input your raw scores, and you get back a scaled score, as well as a section-by-section breakdown of recommendation to improve your score. Leverages free resources from the web as well as my own personal experience to ensure that quality advice is available to all students. Key technologies - Ruby on Rails, Bootstrap.

The Driven

This campaign focuses on driven and succesful individuals who represent the spirit of Porsche. This ongoing campaign runs through the end of the year, highlighting a new individual each month. Inspired by Apple Design, this campaign makes heavy use of sophisticated front-end technologies and effects. Key technologies - AngularJS, jQuery, ScrollMagic.

See More: http://www.thedriven-stories.com/

Please scan QR to visit the mobile site.

Customer Connect

Porsche Customer Connect consisted of a series of hybrid mobile and touchscreen applications which allowed porsche customers to compare car model details through their phones and on large screen installed at the dealership. Key technologies - AngularJS, HTML5.

Please scan QR to visit the mobile site.

Porsche GTS China

Mobile Web Application built for summer GTS events at Porsche Centers across China. Allows dealers to promote and track their events through a custom CMS. Key technologies - NodeJS, AngularJS, MongoDB.

Please scan QR to visit the mobile site.
